newsitem.title: UK: NWE jet barge spreads firm, cargoes trade discreet.
newsitem.headline: NWE jet barge spreads firm, cargoes trade discreet.

text.p: NWE jet barge differentials were assessed firm at around August IPE +$18/$18.50 in slow talk on Friday, traders said.

On cargoes, majors made several private and confidential sales to end users believed to be in the range of $2 to $2.50 over the fob high NWE quotation, equivalent to a premium of around $16 to August IPE.
Mediterranean product and shipping was scarce, assessed at around high fob Med quotes +$7.
